entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
